replies.body: Riot, I beg you to put either headhunter rengar or night hunter rengar on sale.
Please Put {{champion:236}} And {{champion:106}}. Just Maybe Good Champions for Everyone to try! :)

Dude, everyone wanting someone of sale will just have to be lucky if the set roster is with that champion. It's all pre-set from before........So stop asking for Riot to put someone on sale. You're wasting your own time.
vi was on sale quite recently. shes not gonna be on sale for quite a while i reckon

please restore the pre update tundra hunter WW skin. the new one is bland, boring, and disappointing. the old one looked great and actually had a hunter feel to it. its disappointing loading into game with this skin every time. 
the new skin doesn't match the look or feel of the splash art.
only skin update Ive been disappointed with so far.
plz put maokai or lee sin on sale :)
Lol my friend gifted me Rengar {{champion:107}}  on Monday and wasted his rp ;( {{item:3070}}
Riot please put a {{champion:120}}  skin on sale, a {{champion:24}} skin on sale, a {{champion:62}}  skin on sale or put {{champion:238}}  on sale thanks riot
